about.description:
{fmt} is an open-source formatting library for C++.
It can be used as a safe and fast alternative to (s)printf and iostreams.
about.summary: {fmt} is an open-source formatting library for C++

name: fmt
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "fmt" %}
{% set version = "6.1.0" %}
{% set sha256 = "8fb84291a7ed6b4db4769115b57fa56d5467b1ab8c3ba5bdf78c820e4bd17944" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/fmtlib/fmt/archive/{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}
  patches:
    - patches/0001-Add-a-missing-decimal-point-in-exponent-notation-wit.patch
    - patches/0002-Fix-compilation-with-MinGW.patch
    - patches/0003-Update-ChangeLog.rst.patch
    - patches/0004-Export-assert_fail-with-FMT_API.-This-fixes-dll-buil.patch
    - patches/0005-Remove-unneeded-FMT_API.patch
    - patches/0006-Remove-TYPES.patch
    - patches/0007-Revert-1433-because-of-build-failures-1450.patch

build:
  number: 0
  skip: True  # [win and vc<14]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - cmake
    - make  # [unix]

test:
  commands:
    - test -d ${PREFIX}/include/fmt  # [unix]
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/include/fmt/core.h  # [unix]
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/include/fmt/format.h  # [unix]
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/cmake/fmt/fmt-config.cmake  # [unix]
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libfmt.so  # [linux]
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libfmt.dylib  # [osx]
    - if exist %LIBRARY_PREFIX%\include\fmt\core.h (exit 0) else (exit 1)  # [win]
    - if exist %LIBRARY_PREFIX%\include\fmt\format.h (exit 0) else (exit 1)  # [win]
    - if exist %LIBRARY_PREFIX%\lib\cmake\fmt-config.cmake (exit 0) else (exit 1)  # [win]
    - if exist %LIBRARY_PREFIX%\bin\fmt.dll (exit 0) else (exit 1)  # [win]

about:
  home: https://fmt.dev/latest/
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE.rst
  summary: '{fmt} is an open-source formatting library for C++'
  description: |
    {fmt} is an open-source formatting library for C++.
    It can be used as a safe and fast alternative to (s)printf and iostreams.
  doc_url: https://fmt.dev/latest/
  dev_url: https://github.com/fmtlib/fmt

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - tdegeus
    - vitaut
